mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 3169) for an order placed by Dick Flood for 2 cards to Sgt. Secord at the NCO Club at Gunter Air Force Base in Alabama, 2 cards to Sgt. Cline at the NCO Club at Robbins Air Force Base in Georgia, 6 cards to Sgt. Smith at the NCO Club at Fort McClellan in Alabama, 2 cards to Mr. Bill Rogers at the NCO Club at Dobbins Air Force Base in Georgia, 3 cards to the club manager at the NCO Club at the Little Rock Air Force Base in Arkansas, 2 cards to Sgt. Johnson at the NCO Club at Turner Air Force Base in Georgia, and 6 cards to Sgt. Vaught. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
